source: TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_SEQ_00<tab>Adalberta would like to entrust you with a difficult task.
target: TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_SEQ_00<tab>採掘師ギルドのアダルベルタは冒険者に仕事を依頼したいようだ。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_SEQ_01<tab>You learn from Adalberta that Deep Canyon has placed an outrageous order for no fewer than twenty pieces of jade. It seems the precious stones can only be found naturally in Coerthas. Adalberta beseeches you to not do anything for which you are not prepared. In the meantime, however, you are told that Wide Gulley has something to discuss. Seek him out in the guild before making any rash decisions.
target: TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_SEQ_01<tab>アダルベルタから依頼を受けた。ウルダハの採掘師ギルドにいる「ワイド・ガリー」と話をしよう。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_SEQ_02<tab>Somewhat expectedly, Wide Gulley proposes another contest─the first to fulfill Deep Canyon's order wins. Make your way to Haldrath's March in Coerthas, and there obtain twenty pieces of jade. Once you have the required quantity, present them to Adalberta.
target: TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_SEQ_02<tab>ワイド・ガリーと話した。ウルダハの採掘師ギルドにいる「アダルベルタ」に「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　5168)) 01 /var>」を20個納品しよう。「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　5168)) 01 /var>」はクルザス中央高地のアートボルグ砦群の近くの採掘場で採掘できる。

source:
TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_SEQ_03Delivering the jade to Adalberta, you learn to your surprise that you have won the contest by default. Wide Gulley was attacked by a monster and could not complete the order. While the guildmaster applauds your success, she cannot help but feel concerned for your recuperating comrade, who she says is deeply depressed.

※The next miner quest will be available from Adalberta upon reaching level 45.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_SEQ_03アダルベルタにを納品した。一方、ワイド・ガリーは採掘中に、魔物に襲われ負傷したという。勝負に負けたことで、彼はひどく落ち込んでいるらしい。このまま挫折してしまわなければよいが……。彼のことを心配しつつ、採掘師としての修行を続けよう。

※採掘師のレベルが45以上になると、アダルベルタから次の採掘師クエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_TODO_01<tab>Deliver pieces of jade to Adalberta.
TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_ADALBERTA_000_000<tab>Have you heard, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? The latest tally has you tied with Wide Gulley as the guild's highest earner!
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_ADALBERTA_000_000お、探してたんだよ、キミのこと。
今やキミは、ワイド・ガリーと並んで、
この採掘師ギルドの稼ぎ頭といっていい。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_ADALBERTA_000_001<tab>You started as a novice with a rusty pickaxe─now you're one of our stoutest pillars. You've truly come a long way, my friend.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_ADALBERTA_000_001けどね、それだけに……
キミにしかできない仕事が増えてきた。
……特に、アマジナ鉱山社絡みはね。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_ADALBERTA_000_002<tab>I find myself turning to you more often for difficult orders, the bulk of which have been coming from Deep Canyon. As you should well know from past expeditions, these tend to entail going to dangerous locales.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_ADALBERTA_000_002大変な依頼ばかり任せて、申し訳ないと思ってる。
ディープ・キャニオンの企みは、
あたしたちの評判を落とすこと。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_ADALBERTA_000_003<tab>I'm loath to put my people in harm's way, but the Concern owns us─in truth, if not in name. It'd be ill done to refuse their requests, no matter how onerous.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_ADALBERTA_000_003こっちは雇われの身だから、
アマジナ鉱山社の意向だと言われてしまえば、
ディープ・キャニオンの嫌がらせのような依頼を断れない。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_ADALBERTA_000_004<tab>But just this once, I've a mind to do just that. I can't in good conscience order you to a wild place like Coerthas merely for the sake of twenty pieces of jade.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_ADALBERTA_000_004でもね、今回だけは断ってもいいよ。
行き先が、あのクルザスだからね……！
あそこが危険な場所っていうのは、誰だって知ってるもの。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_ADALBERTA_000_005<tab>Aye, that's what Deep Canyon is requesting this time. And if I <var 1A 02 /var>have<var 1A 01 /var> to send someone, you've rightly proven yourself the best candidate. But you should understand how risky the endeavor. Think long and hard before you do something we <var 1A 02 /var>both<var 1A 01 /var> regret.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_ADALBERTA_000_005クルザス中央高地の「アートボルグ砦群」で、
「」を採掘してこいだなんて、いくらなんでも……！

source: TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_ADALBERTA_000_006<tab>While you're mulling it over, though, I should let you know that Wide Gulley wanted a word. You'll find him in the usual place.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_ADALBERTA_000_006だけど、それでもキミが行ってくれるというなら……
「ワイド・ガリー」が、キミに話があると言っていた。
彼の話を聞いてみてほしい。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_WIDEGULLEY_000_010<tab>I take it you've heard about the job. An' I can tell from the look in your eyes that you're already on board with givin' it a go.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_WIDEGULLEY_000_010件の依頼を受けるのだな……さすが、と褒めておこう。
前回、お前がを採掘してみせたとき……
俺は、かつてない敗北感にまみれた。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_WIDEGULLEY_000_011<tab>When you came back with the amethysts that last time, I came to realize somethin'─a true miner must be prepared to risk life an' limb for his prize.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_WIDEGULLEY_000_011俺は採掘師を、まだ甘く考えていたとな。
真の採掘師とは、命を懸けて採掘する覚悟を
持つのだと知った……！

source: TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_WIDEGULLEY_000_012<tab>Minin' for jade at no less a place than Haldrath's March in Coerthas would be the perfect way to put my conviction to the proof.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_WIDEGULLEY_000_012だから……危険の多い「クルザス中央高地」で、
「」を20個採掘するという
この仕事は、今の俺にとって、おあつらえ向きだった。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_WIDEGULLEY_000_013<tab>I challenge you to another contest. The first to find twenty pieces of jade and deliver them to Adalberta is the winner! The superior miner by all objective measures!
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_WIDEGULLEY_000_013ゆえに、この依頼……俺も命を懸けて取り組む。
最高の採掘師になり、ギルドマスターの座を得るために！
この依頼で、俺とお前……どちらが優れた採掘師か勝負だ！

source: TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_ADALBERTA_000_020<tab><sigh> I understand Wide Gulley has challenged you yet again. I know the temptation is to seek out victory whatever the cost, but winning isn't everything. You do what's right for <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_ADALBERTA_000_020ワイド・ガリーに勝負を挑まれたそうね。
さっさと「」を20個採掘して、
帰ってきなさい……無事にね。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_ADALBERTA_000_021<tab>By the Twelve, this is the jade... And such fine samples, too! Congratulations are in order─you've won the contest!
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_ADALBERTA_000_021……見事な「」よ、勝負はキミの勝ちね。
もっとも、どちらにしろ、キミの勝ちだったのだけど。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_ADALBERTA_000_022<tab>...By default, that is. Wide Gulley never got his twenty pieces, you see. As he went about his work, he lowered his guard and was attacked by a fell fiend. His wounds were such that it was all he could do to run to safety.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_ADALBERTA_000_022ワイド・ガリーは、を採掘できなかったの。
クルザスで、魔物に不意を突かれてね……。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_ADALBERTA_000_023<tab>He's whole of body, if somewhat worse for wear. He's like to be out of action for a while.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_ADALBERTA_000_023……ツイてたのね、命に別状はないわ。
採掘師としての仕事ができなくなるってこともない。
それなりに怪我は負っているけど。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_ADALBERTA_000_024<tab>But that's not the worst of it. More than the wounds you can <var 1A 02 /var>see<var 1A 01 /var>, I worry for his state of mind. He saw you as a rival to surpass, but he ended up losing in a contest he himself devised.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_ADALBERTA_000_024でも、より酷いのは……心の傷よ。
勝負の場にすら立てずに、ワイド・ガリーが敗れた。
キミという、彼が越えるべき壁と認識する存在にね。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_ADALBERTA_000_025<tab>That kind of disappointment is enough to break most people. Trust me, I know.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_ADALBERTA_000_025こういうとき、人はとても脆いのよ。
あたしは、そうやって折れてしまった人を知っている。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_ADALBERTA_000_026<tab>But I pray that Wide Gulley has the strength to get back on his feet and take up the pickaxe once more. It'd be a shame to lose one so gifted.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_ADALBERTA_000_026そう……誰もが立ち上がれるほど、タフなわけじゃない。
でも、彼がここで道を諦めるのはあまりにも惜しいわ……！

source: TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_ADALBERTA_000_027<tab>Let's return to the matter before us, though. I wasn't exaggerating about the quality of this jade. Its purity and strength allow you to see why it's thought of as the embodiment of immortality.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_ADALBERTA_000_027そういえば……は、
不老不死の象徴でもあるのよ。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_ADALBERTA_000_028<tab>Since ancient times, man has chosen to adorn his tools and garb with it. Imbuing yourself with the everlasting is certainly an attractive notion.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_ADALBERTA_000_028やのような
装備品にはめ込むのは、その加護を期待してのことよ。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_ADALBERTA_000_029<tab>And no one is more aware of that tradition than Wide Gulley. It's for that very reason I intend to create for him a gift of jade.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_ADALBERTA_000_029うん、だから……このを、
ワイド・ガリーに贈ろうと思うの。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_ADALBERTA_000_030<tab>The stone bears my hopes that he will rise again, no matter how often the Spinner might see fit to test him, and bring him to his knees.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN400_00644_ADALBERTA_000_030このが象徴する不老不死のごとく、
何度も立ち上がり、何事にも不屈であれって、ね。
